page.title: 14A Boarder's Day at Bootham
page.content: Also Physical Education,Computing and Pottery.The teaching day is from 9 until 3.50.We have "bars"at 11am (orange juice and biscuits),and lunch at 12.30. Lunch has five sittings:it is self-service.After lessons we have 40mins to "mess about"before Activity Hour when we pursue a hobby of our own choice e.g.chess,computing, football, art,printing,drama.Day pupils go home at 5.30:we have tea,then prep (homework)from 7 to 8 supervised by a reeve(prefect) and MOD(master on duty) We return to Junior House,once the house of Joseph Rowntree,one time headmaster of Bootham and chocolate manufacturer.Here we have our bedrooms,T.V.,table tennis and snooker.Supper is at 8.20.We have cereals,milk,fruit,crisps or, best of all,toast.Lights out is at 9.10 and we shoud sleep--we may have bedroom raids
